rules_text:
Living ritual [i](When this Equipment enters, create a 1/0 red Devil creature token or a token copy of this cards back face, then attach this to it.)[/i]
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has prowess.
Whenever an ability of equipped creature is activated or triggered, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Equip {3}. This ability costs {3} less to activate if it targets a Demon.
rules_text2:
Flying, indestructible
When there aren’t exactly three different names among Implements you control, exile Sulmina, the Final Age.
